title: Break dancing dingbat
content:
Hey guys & gals - A few years ago I think I had a dingbat and now I can't find it and I'm not sure if it even really existed or if I imagined it...but does anybody know know where I could find a dingbat font that has like breakdancing stuff or 80s hip-hop type stuff?   
   
any help - thanks   
Tom
author: dangerboy

comments.content: There's also Blue Vinyl's [Awesome 80's](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123005725/http:/www.bvfonts.com/free/fonts7.shtml) (second from top).
